We are seeking an experienced academic in the area of AI and Big Data having a PhD in the related field, from a recognized university. As a Faculty member, you will have an excellent research track record and will be required to demonstrate research leadership from the outset. You will be expected to raise the profile of the Faculty through external networking, and producing high impact, high profile publications. In addition, you will be expected to seek to gain your own research funding to develop/expand your role within the university.




Qualifications & Experience:

• PhD. in Computer Science/AI and Big Data (or related discipline) from a recognized international academic institution

• Teaching experience at an internationally recognized institution in area related to Computer Science, AI, Data Analytics.

• Working knowledge of techniques and tools for: Big Data Management, Big Data Mining Techniques and Implementation, Foundations of Artificial Intelligence, Modern Artificial Intelligence, Computer vision and applications, Data Mining, Database performance tuning, GANs, Generative AI, and Natural language processing.

• Industry experience related to AI and Machine Learning projects is a plus

• An active researcher in the field (or related field) with publications in recognized international journals

• Fluency in the English language (both spoken and written)

• Excellent communication skills

Preferred Qualifications

• Documented experience in the application of Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Big Data Analysis to modern information systems problems

• Ability to teach and conduct research about the latest AI and Big Data Analysis techniques and strategies as well as the project skills to apply this knowledge in the real world

• Ability to teach and conduct research about the latest computer science topics to design, implement and test AI based solutions for solving complex problems.

• Working knowledge of Relational and Cloud databases

• Experience with Hadoop, HBase, Spark and other Big data management technologies

• Experience with AI and Machine learning models, and related libraries and platforms (e.g. TensorFlow, Keras, caffe, PyTorch, Theano, OpenCV, OpenAI, Gemini).




Compensation & Benefits:

The successful candidate will enjoy interaction with a professional and dynamic team of highly respected educators from over 50 different countries and exposure to students from over 100 nationalities.

The University is located in Knowledge Park, Dubai and has excellent teaching, learning and research facilities as well as access to Library resources that meets international standards.
